developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Unofficial Companion App
This app is not a game. It is a powerful companion tool designed for football game enthusiasts who want to get more from their experience. Packed with databases, calculators, tutorials, and build tools everything you need to plan your dream team.

PLAYER DATABASE
Explore a detailed player database with smart tools to help you find top talent and understand their strengths.

View player stats at max level.

See dribbling skills with controller animations.

Understand how condition affects stats and ratings.

Instantly spot top 6 key stats on every player card.

Track player form throughout the season.

MANAGER DATABASE
Stay ahead with up-to-date manager formations and tactics.

Find managers who have changed tactics weekly.

Search based on offensive and defensive playstyles.

Use the formation search tool to find your perfect setup.

SQUAD BUILDER
Build squads like a pro, with full control over strength and cost.

Automatically calculate team strength for 2, 3, or 4-star builds.

Position players under different managers.

Save unlimited squads and experiment freely.

Use Auto Build for quick team generation.

Track contract cost totals for better squad planning.

GAME PLAN
Simulate off-the-ball movement in attack and defense to spot tactical strengths and weaknesses in your squad.

HIDDEN GEM FINDER
Discover underrated players with high potential and low contract renewal cost — perfect for long-term builds.

MY TEAM
Save your favorite players and managers to access quickly when building squads or browsing stats.

SKILL MOVE TUTORIALS
Learn how to perform dribbling skills step-by-step with controller animations — for both mobile and console players.

Disclaimer
This is an app designed for learning and planning purposes. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any football game developer or publisher.

app_name: ตีแบด - หาคอร์ท หาเพื่อนตีแบด
description:
แอปพลิเคชันแบดมินตันครบวงจร ที่จะทำให้ชีวิตนักแบดฯ ของคุณง่ายขึ้นกว่าเดิม! ไม่ว่าคุณจะเป็นมือใหม่หรือมือโปร แอปนี้คือผู้ช่วยส่วนตัวที่จะพาคุณไปสู่ประสบการณ์แบดมินตันที่สมบูรณ์แบบ

ค้นหาสนามที่ใช่ ใกล้คุณที่สุด:
สำรวจสนามแบดมินตันทั่วประเทศบนแผนที่แบบเรียลไทม์
ฟิลเตอร์ตามสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวก (มีแอร์, ที่จอดรถ, ห้องอาบน้ำ, ร้านค้า) ประเภทคอร์ท (ไม้, ยาง, ปูน) และสถานะเปิด 24 ชม.
ดูข้อมูลสนามครบถ้วน ทั้งราคา เวลาเปิด-ปิด รูปภาพ และรีวิวจากผู้ใช้งานจริง

หาก๊วน / หาเพื่อนตี:
เบื่อไหมที่ไม่มีคู่ซ้อม? ค้นหาเพื่อนตีแบดหรือก๊วนที่ระดับฝีมือใกล้เคียงกับคุณ
เข้าร่วมกลุ่มตีแบดในพื้นที่ หรือสร้างก๊วนของคุณเอง

AiScore is your Live score expert, bringing to you more information, more statistics and a completely new experience on your smartphone. Here you are even informed faster than the TV viewers!

With In-depth coverage of football, basketball, tennis and snooker, AiScore brings you live score,goals, yellow or red cards, H2H, fixtures, match live, team and player stats, standings, lineups and other important stats from English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, UEFA Champions League, NBA, FIBA, Basketball Champions League, ATP tennis, WTA tennis, World Snooker Championship - major or small leagues and competitions all over the world!

TOP HIGHLIGHTS:

*All Games - Follow all today's matches in real time. Also, you can check out the matches on specific day by DateTime Picker.

*Live - Stay up to date with all the latest scores and results from hundreds and thousands of games worldwide. Every score at a glance. Just tap the matchup for Box Score or Lineups, H2H and Match Live.

*Favorites - Choose your favorite team and competition on matchup and always be up-to-date.

*Instant Notification - Get instant notifications of goal, corner, red or yellow card, start, starting lineups and final results for all live or your followed matches. A pop-up window will appear to inform you of score changing when you turn on the "Score Reminder”.

*Leagues - In-depth coverage of leagues, cups and tournaments from over 200 countries. Check out latest rankings, standings, team or player stats and more.

Football: Over 2,600 different football matches, over 37,000 teams (including Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Championship and many more)

Basketball: Over 500 tournaments including FIBA Basketball World Cup, NBA, BCL

Tennis: Complete source for worldwide tennis matches including ATP, WTA

Snooker: Complete source for worldwide snooker matches including World Championship, UK Championship, Masters

*Chatroom - Get connected with other sports fans from all over the world. No game is boring if you can chat live.

*Language - 28 (more will be added)

UniScore is an app that provides real-time live score updates, fast and accurate down to the second, with extensive information on sports results, match statistics, and live streaming experience.

You will know the score, goals, instant goal notifications, red cards, yellow cards, H2H, match schedules, football results today, team & player statistics, and more for a variety of sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, Baseball, American Football, Badminton, along with sports predictions faster than TV viewers!
UniScore covers a wide range of sports events, from major to minor tournaments worldwide, including Premier League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, and more.

Key Features
•  All Matches: Real-time updates for all matches today; easily check match info from previous days.
•  Ongoing Matches: Continuously update scores & results from thousands of global sporting events. Just tap to view stats, team lineups, H2H, live simulation.
•  Favorites: Follow your favorite teams and matches to get real-time updates.
•  Instant Notifications: Faster than live broadcast – customize notifications for goals, lineups, results, red cards, yellow cards, corners, and more.
•  Tournaments: Detailed database from over 200 countries – check match details, teams, players, stats, and real-time results anytime.
•  Heatmap: Visually display player activity and contributions on the field.
•  Player & Team Comparison: Compare player and team stats for a comprehensive view.
•  Search Function: Quickly search for teams, players, tournaments, or matches you are interested in.
•  Pre-match Analysis & Stats: Provides comprehensive historical data and performance comparisons to assist in predictions.
•  Match Highlights: Watch key moments such as goals, red cards, yellow cards… right after the event via official YouTube highlight videos from the tournament.

Why Choose UniScore
•  Faster than TV: Instantly update every goal, card, substitution.
•  In-depth & Accurate Stats: From historical data to detailed player and team statistics.
•  Smart Analysis: Compare, view heatmaps, and pre-match analysis to easily predict outcomes.
•  Global Coverage: Over 200 countries, thousands of major and minor tournaments.
•  Personalized Notifications: Customize to never miss the moments that matter to you.
•  User-friendly Interface: Easy to use, optimized for daily sports following.

More Sports
•  Football: Over 2,600 football leagues, more than 37,000 teams (including Premier League, UEFA Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, National Cup, FA Cup, English League Cup, Europa League, League One, Coppa Italia, etc.)
•  Basketball: NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League (Greece), Serie A (Italy), Liga ACB (Spain)
•  Tennis: ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slam (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
•  Baseball: MLB, LMB (Mexico), Pro Yakyu - NPB (Japan)
•  Badminton: BWF World Tour, BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Sudirman Cup
•  American Football: NFL, NCAA (College Football)

Need Support or Have Feedback?
•  Please email us at: info@uniscore.com

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

The perfect companion for your next outdoor adventure. Seek, find, record and return home with Handy GPS.
This app is a real navigation tool designed for outdoors sports like hiking, bushwalking, mountain biking, kayaking and trail riding. It allows you to work in UTM or lat/lon coordinates.

Note: This version of the app is limited to storing 3 waypoints and 40 tracklog points. The paid version does not have these limits.

Features:

* View your current location in UTM or Lat/Lon formats.
* Record and/or manually enter waypoints.
* Goto a waypoint.
* Record a track log.
* Show your current location, waypoints and tracklogs on a map.
* Export waypoints and tracklogs to a KML file for viewing in Google Earth, or to a GPX file.
* Import KML or GPX files and view in the app.
* Email your current location to a friend.
* Odometer to keep track of how far you've gone.
* Magnetic compass.
* Supports both metric and US/imperial units.
* Supports datums WGS84, GDA94, AGD66 and AGD84. (Use WGS84 for NAD83)
* Can show your current location as an MGRS grid ref (WGS84 only).
* Optional walk timer.

Additional features only available in the paid version include:
* Entry of parameters for a custom datum (e.g. ED50, SAD69, OSGB36, etc)
* Elevation profile.
* Compute sun rise and set times.
* Unlimited waypoints and tracklog points.

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. To save battery power you can close the app from the task manager. The developer accepts no responsibility for you getting lost while using this app.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

Introducing Scoreboard: the simple yet awesome companion for keeping score. It does exactly what you'd expect - tracks the score - but it offers so much more!

Take your scorekeeping to the next level with Scoreboard, the ultimate app for tracking scores and managing games. Whether you're playing sports, board games, or organizing a tournament, Scoreboard has you covered. It's time to elevate your scorekeeping experience and leave pen and paper behind!

What can Scoreboard do for you?
* Keep score effortlessly!
* Assign player names.
* Add player profile images.
* Customize point increments.
* Choose a theme color for your game.
* Set the winning point goal.
* Adjust font style and size.
* Increase points with a tap or swipe up, decrease with a swipe down.
* Automatic game saving.
* Supports dark mode.

Scoreboard is perfect for a wide range of sports and games: 
Basketball, Soccer, Handball, Football, Tennis, Table Tennis, Hockey, Volleyball, Boxing, Judo, Wrestling,  Badminton, Lacrosse, Cornhole, Baseball, Bowling, Board Games, MMA, Skiing, Cricket, Golf, Ping Pong

And guess what? I try to limit ads that will interrupt your game. I know how annoying they can be, so I've got your back! Enjoy uninterrupted scorekeeping with Scoreboard!

Unlock the full potential of Scoreboard and dive into a world of premium features with our exclusive auto-renewing yearly subscription plan priced at just $6.99 USD/year.  Elevate your scorekeeping experience

For more information about how we handle your data and ensure your privacy, please review our Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Job3EQpVdnOLdgYssAn-6GWYbheWIO5ftKh0CQzuve8/edit. By using Scoreboard, you agree to our Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/.

Upgrade your game.

HomeCourt is the free, interactive basketball app that helps anyone get better. It’s the personal basketball trainer that’s always with you, capturing your performance, your stats, and your progress—guiding you to the next level. With HomeCourt, every rep counts. 

TRAIN SMARTER
HomeCourt captures your moves and your stats as you train—so you can see your true skill level. HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING
• Free: Access the full library of 100+ drills and activities. Get unlimited shot tracking.
• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

HomeCourt Plus is available for subscription as either monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account upon the expiration of the free trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless the subscription is canceled or auto-renew turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration of the free trial period or the current subscription period. Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to App Store account settings after purchase. Please visit https://www.homecourt.ai/legal/terms for the complete terms of use.

Got any questions or feedback?
Please shoot us an email at support@homecourt.ai. We'd love to hear from you.

MATCHDAY จะช่วยให้คุณสามารถจองสนามได้ง่ายๆ เพียงไม่กี่ขั้นตอนบนโทรศัพท์ของคุณ ไม่ว่าคุณจะมาเป็นทีมหรือมาคนเดียว เราก็พร้อมที่จะหาเพื่อนร่วมทีมและคู่แข่งให้กับคุณ เรามีกีฬาให้คุณเลือกเล่นหลากหลาย เรารวบรวมทุกสนาม ทุกคอร์ทมาไว้ให้คุณเรียบร้อย ไม่ต้องเสียเวลาโทรถามเองให้ยุ่งยากอีกต่อไป

-จองสนามกีฬาได้ทันทีผ่านโทรศัพท์
กีฬาไหนๆ เราก็มีให้คุณได้เล่น ไม่ว่าจะในร่มหรือกลางแจ้ง เช็คตารางเวลาและจองได้ตลอดเวลา MATCHDAY ให้คุณค้นหาสนามที่ตรงตามเวลาที่ต้องการของคุณและเพื่อนภายในเวลา 10 วินาที

-รู้รายละเอียดสนาม
คุณจะเล่นกีฬาได้อย่างมีความสุขมากขึ้นด้วย MATCHDAY ที่จะช่วยคุณรู้รายละเอียด สภาพสนาม และสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกต่าง ๆ ได้อย่างครบถ้วน โดยไม่ต้องยกหูโทรถามสนาม

-ขยายสังคมการเล่นกีฬาของตัวเอง
อยู่บ้าน เบื่อๆ เหงาๆ ใช่ไหม? แค่มีแอปฯเราไว้ ก็ออกไปเล่นกีฬาที่สนามใกล้บ้านได้ นอกจาก MATCHDAY เราจะเป็นแอปฯเพื่อจองสนามแล้ว เรายังสร้างฟังก์ชั่นเข้าไปร่วมเล่นกีฬากับคนอื่นได้ แถมยังมีเพื่อนใหม่ๆอีกด้วยนา

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议
